Class SQL.Functions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.odbc.SQL.Functions
  • Enclosing class:
    SQL
    public static final class SQL.Functions
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the function pointers loaded from the odbc SharedLibrary.
